events.title: Start of the American Civil War
events.description: Confederate forces attacked Fort Sumter in South Carolina, marking the beginning of the American Civil War.
events.significance: This event led to the longest and deadliest conflict in American history, shaping the nation's future on slavery and state sovereignty.

events.title: First Human Spaceflight by Yuri Gagarin
events.description: Soviet cosmonaut Yuri Gagarin became the first human to orbit the Earth aboard Vostok 1.
events.significance: This milestone marked the beginning of human space exploration and intensified the space race during the Cold War.

events.title: Death of President Franklin D. Roosevelt
events.description: US President Franklin D. Roosevelt died while in office during his fourth term, leading to Vice President Harry Truman assuming the presidency.
events.significance: Roosevelt's death during World War II brought a critical change in US leadership at a pivotal point in global history.

events.title: First Appearance of Superman
events.description: Action Comics #1 was published, marking the first appearance of Superman.
events.significance: Superman became an iconic character in comic books and popular culture, pioneering the superhero genre.
